content: We have a number of departments that have workstudies or interns working alongside employees. Is setting them up as single-stream guest users an appropriate use of that license type? Are guest users able to participate in 1-to-1 and group PMs in addition to their single assigned stream?
@Jeremy Bascom yes, they can participate fully in PMs.
It depends on your organization's model for interns; some folks would have them as normal members.

But the intended use case for "guests" in our current model is temporary folks like contractors who might not be a full member of the organization, and I could see a company classifying their interns that way.
